title: 06/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan recaps all the action from an extended weekend of playoff sports. Can the Lakers still be a threat without star power forward Anthony Davis in the lineup? Sports Illustrated's senior NBA writer Chris Mannix joins the show to discuss why he's picking the Suns to advance past the Lakers. And Dan discusses the situation with tennis star Naomi Osaka deciding to withdraw from the French Open due to social anxiety issues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
